mapper.insert: insert into t86_1_members_msg(no, sender, addressee, messege ) values(s86_1_members_msg_no.nextVal,#{sender},#{addressee},#{messege})
mapper.select: select * from t86_1_members_msg where sender = #{sender} order by no desc
select * from t86_1_members_msg where addressee = #{addressee} order by no desc
